nodes.text: "The High Tower" (German title "Der Turm") is a comic strip written by Alec Worley, drawn by Cosmo White and edited by Gunther Nickel. The story was first published in Star Wars Fun & Action 1 on March 18, 2020, before later bring republished in the May 2020 issue of the Australian K-Zone Magazine.
The comic partially adapts the episode of the same name of the television series Star Wars Resistance.

In the scene where Kazuda Xiono hides in Torra Doza's quarters, multiple dolls of popular Studio Ghibli character Totoro is visible in the background. This doll was not present in the episode from which the comic was sourced.
